thread.title: Woman's best friend gives birth to her surrogate baby
thread.title_full: Woman's best friend gives birth to her surrogate baby

title: Woman's best friend gives birth to her surrogate baby
text: Captured on camera: The incredible moment a woman's best friend of 20 years gives birth to the surrogate baby she was told she'd never carry herself Calie Fletcher, 45, struggled with fertility issues and failed rounds of IVF After the birth of her son her uterus was damaged and she could not carry a child Her friend Jeni Mitchel, 41, selflessly offered to be her surrogate She went through IVF treatment with the Fletcher's embryo, and fell pregnant Little Annika was born healthy three weeks ago after a drama-free pregnancy The best friends hope to raise awareness about surrogacy by sharing their story Published: 04:54 GMT, 7 February 2017 | Updated: 04:54 GMT, 7 February 2017 248 shares
